thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Prudential Financial Announces Q4 Earnings Per Share $8.61

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Prudential Financial Announces Q4 Earnings Per Share $8.61
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Prudential Financial Inc:
* PRUDENTIAL FINANCIAL, INC. ANNOUNCES 2017 RESULTS * Q4 ADJUSTED OPERATING EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.69 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $8.61 * Q4 NET INCOME INCLUDED A BENEFIT OF $2.871 BILLION OR $6.64 PER COMMON SHARE AS A RESULT OF TAX ACT
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.65 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* ‍ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT AMOUNTED TO $1.394 TRILLION AT DECEMBER 31, 2017, COMPARED TO $1.264 TRILLION A YEAR EARLIER​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
